name: Centre for Development Communication Trust, Jaipur
briefDescription: Centre for Development Communication (CDC) involved in management of Solid Waste in Urban and Rural areas through scientifically designed & effective methodologies for last 16 years, headquartered at Jaipur and having pan-India presence, with on-going projects in more than 16 cities. Our key operational areas are Waste Management in Urban and Rural areas, Urban and Rural Health, Professional Internship, Training & Research, Microfinance, Social Security of waste workers and street vendors. CDC offers a comprehensive service for solid waste management, emphasizing integrated approach for management of MSW from segregated waste collection at source, efficient and effective transportation and scientific disposal.
